summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReWear POS login system and new features. All major functionality working correctly including role-based access, Google Bildersuche, and color customization for all three groups.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown overlay causes click interception issues when trying to close

passed_tests: Login system with admin/smilla users (both password 1234)
Role-based access - admin sees Gefahrenzone, smilla doesn't
Google Bildersuche button with external link icon
Design tab with all three color groups: Preisniveau, Zustand, Relevanz
Icon selection for custom categories in Kategorien tab
User dropdown shows correct username and role
Settings page navigation and tabs functionality
Color customization with 11 color inputs total
